snippet: The purely electric hatchback was named the greenest car of the year by the American Council for an Energy-Efficient Economy, depriving the Civic Natural Gas of a ninth consecutive year atop the list.
abstract: The purely electric hatchback was named the greenest car of the year by the American Council for an Energy-Efficient Economy, depriving the Civic Natural Gas of a ninth consecutive year atop the list.

headline.main: Courtesy of Mitsubishi i, Honda Loses Top Spot on Annual List of Green Cars
